amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Food for Peace Title II Grants account by $940,198,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Food for Peace Title II Grants account by $940,198,000 and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 316 (Roll no. 434).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 316 (Roll no. 434).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
